visuals.atmosphere: Perpetual twilight filtered through a heavy smog-ceiling.
visuals.architecture: Brutalist steel structures built into crater walls, connected by swaying suspension bridges and steam-pipes.
visuals.lighting: Flickering neon green and sodium orange; high-altitude searchlights from patrolling drones.

districts.name: The Rim
districts.description: The highest level of the crater. Clean air, stable power, and the headquarters of the Iron Order.

districts.name: The Steam-Works
districts.description: The mid-section where geothermal vents are processed. Constant noise and heat.
districts.key_location: The Valve (A central bar for technicians)

districts.name: The Deep-Sump
districts.description: The bottom of the crater where toxic runoff collects. Home to outcasts and 'Unregistered' units.

economy.exports: Refined battery cells, refurbished droid parts

factions.name: The Iron Order
factions.goal: Maintaining absolute machine efficiency and resource control.

factions.name: The Drifters
factions.goal: Survival and the trade of forbidden 'Pre-Collapse' artifacts.

current_rumors: A shipment of high-grade Core Stability cells was hijacked near the Deep-Sump.
The Iron Order is planning a 'bio-purge' of the lower levels.
Someone found a functional satellite uplink in a rusted scrap pile.

visuals.appearance: Lanky, exposed hydraulic wiring in the neck. Missing its left faceplate, revealing a flickering amber optical sensor.
visuals.clothing: A heavy, grease-stained leather apron over a rusted chassis. Multiple utility pouches filled with soldering tools.
visuals.idle_animation: Obsessively polishing a small copper coil with a piece of frayed silk.

personality.voice_tone: Raspy, mechanical stutter, high-pitched static when excited.
personality.temperament: Nervous but brilliant. Hoards knowledge like currency.

utility.unique_skill: Can bypass Iron Order security encryption (for a price).

narrative_hooks.secret: He is actually a deserter from the Iron Order's elite engineering squad.
narrative_hooks.goal: To build a signal jammer powerful enough to hide the entire Deep-Sump from drone scans.
narrative_hooks.dialogue_opener: Careful where you step, stranger... that floor plate is live. You looking for a fix, or just a place to leak oil?

weapons.name: ION-STUTTER
weapons.description: A handheld emitter that fires unstable blue ions. Excellent against shields, poor against thick plating.

armor.name: SCAVENGER WRAPS
armor.description: Tattered thermal fabric reinforced with thin copper plates. It's quiet and blends into the smog.

armor.name: REINFORCED HULL-PLATE
armor.description: Industrial-grade plating welded directly to the frame. You're a walking tank, but everyone hears you coming.

consumables.name: ION-CELL (STABLE)
consumables.description: A glowing blue cylinder. The lifeblood of any unit in the wastes.

consumables.name: NANITE-REPAIR PASTE
consumables.description: A viscous gray fluid that seals punctures and re-solders broken circuits on contact.
